title: Daomu Biji: Wu Xie’s Private Notes - Novel Updates
tags: Clever Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Friendship   Male Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secrets
author: Nan Pai San Shu   Xu Lei   南派三叔
description: The notes that Wu Xie, the protagonist of the novel 'Daomu Biji', have always carried with him are in this notebook. There are texts, photos, hand-drawn pictures, receipts and vouchers acquired along the way, private evaluations of teammates, and feelings about history. His various thoughts as he traveled to tombs are also recorded in this notebook.>
